snippet: As North Korea enters the final countdown to its launch of a long-range missile, South Korea is debating Lady Gaga, and her young fans - her "little monsters," as she calls them - are not happy.
abstract: As North Korea enters the final countdown to its launch of a long-range missile, South Korea is debating Lady Gaga, and her young fans - her "little monsters," as she calls them - are not happy.

headline.main: 'Little Monsters' in South Korea Are Not Amused
